programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The team goes electric, as Jonny and Vicki test Audi's first electric model, the eTron SUV versus the Tesla Model X. And, Vicki looks at second-hand electric cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki unveils the long-awaited new Tesla Model 3 electric car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear presents some of the best Hot Hatches - those clever cars that neatly combine practicality, performance and affordability - that have featured on the show over the last twenty years.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and guest presenter Rebecca Jackson take part in one of the most enduring and eccentric motorsport events in Britain The Exeter Trial. They must tackle impossibly steep and muddy hills during a 24 hour driving marathon through Devon

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson visit Poland to sample some of the sights, sounds and car culture there. Tiff competes in the final stage of the Barborka Rally, that takes place on the icy streets of Warsaw as night falls.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tries to crack 150mph as she makes an attempt on the Blindfolded Land Speed World Record. Can Vicki hold her nerve and set a new record for driving in a straight line?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson makes an unprecedented attempt to hit 200mph in an A1 Grand Prix car. Tom Ford and Jonny Smith take the seven newest hot hatches on sale and decide which is best.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is finding out if progress has been made by Mitsubishi, as she races a classic Evo 6 against the very latest Evo 9.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell employs the help of two models to test the theory that the quicker you drive a convertible, the less your hair blows. He blasts the brand new Bentley Continental GTC up to 150mph.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson jets off to Portugal to drive the new Mazda MX5. It's the best selling sportscar in the world, but have Mazda fixed something that wasn't broken.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell drives the Pagani Zonda, an astonishing Italian supercar that boasts a 7-litre, 550 horsepower engine and 200 mph plus performance.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff pits Renault's latest hot hatch the stripped out and hardcore Megane R26.R, against a Caterham CDX. Jonny brings us his verdict on the brand new Ford Ka. Tim delves into the world of car crime, to make us more aware of what criminals look for.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which is quickest, the VW Golf GTi or Subaru Impreza WRX. Jonny proves there are still some amazing cars that you can buy for under Â£1500. Jason tests the Lotus Elise to find out if this is the finest car Lotus has ever produced.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff puts the latest Caterham through its paces in an unusual test. Tom drives Seat's brand new family saloon - the Exeo. Jonny invents three practical tests for the brand-new Nissan Pixo. Jason gets to enjoy the Lamborghini LP670-4 Super Veloce.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki meets 12 times Motor Trials champion and British motorcycling legend Dougie Lampkin. Jonny investigates another way of making cash from old cars. Jason takes the Ford Focus RS in the first TV drive of Ford's awesome new hot hatch.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff take part in another famous Fifth Gear dogfight on Quad Bikes. Jonny attends an auction of DVLA number plates. Vicki tests the Alfa Romeo Mito the new supermini that could finally wipe the smile off the faces of legions of Mini owners

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits two diesel coupes against each other. Jonny braves the freezing weather to show off three cabriolets, with a budget of just Â£5,000. Tom puts the Ford Fiesta against the Seat Ibiza in three tests. Tiff drives the Lamborghini Gallardo

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: An exclusive insight into America's most glamorous supercar club, based in an underground bunker at a private jet airport, Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race the BMW M3 against the Audi RS4.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tests Ford's Focus ST170 and concludes that it's a good car in a refined sort of way but no rival for the current hot hatch favourite, Honda's Civic Type-R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell takes two coupes onto the Fifth Gear track - the Mazda RX8 and Nissan 350Z. Vicki Butler-Henderson spends a day with Formula One star Lewis Hamilton. Tom Ford is the lucky man behind the wheel of the facelifted Mercedes SL63 AMG.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell look at the car accident that's ten times as likely to cause you an injury as any other; a rear impact.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki takes the Focus RS and the Escort Cosworth to find out once and for all which handles best around a track. Jason drives the Grand Tourer and delivers his verdict whether the Â£78,000 asking price would represent money well spent.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason pit the Volkswagen Scirocco and Mini Cooper S against each other. Green driving is the subject of Jonny's attention as he gets behind the wheel of Honda's Insight hybrid. Tom drives the world's smallest four seater - the Toyota iQ.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford's been testing the Mazda's new MX5 Roadster Coupe; and Vicki Butler-Henderson has been thrashing Porsche's 911 GT3.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race two V8 mega-saloons. Tom Ford has the only television test of the charismatic Dodge Challenger. Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out which car is quickest between the Vauxhall Astra Nurburgring and Ford Focus ST.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The pestilential nuisance of cowboy clamping is now more common than ever. There are no rules or regulations governing the renegade companies that organise these rackets.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell test drives the new Aston Martin V8 Vantage, billed as the most desirable sportscar in the world. Jon Bentley reveals definitively whether expensive petrol is worth the extra cash.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests he BMW M5, by driving from the UK to the famous Pau circuit in the South of France. Tom Ford tests the world's maddest car - the Ariel Atom.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford drives Volvo's stylish new coupe, the C30; and Tiff Needell tests whether a green supercar really can be fun in Lotus' bio-fuel powered Exige 265E.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests two cars that are low, light and very fast - Lotus Exige S v Caterham CSR. Tom visits Spain to drive the Toyota Landcruiser. Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black. Tiff teaches Heston Blumenthal the art of powersliding.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell has a tough assignment. Our selfless road tester has to fly to Nice to drive the ultimate Mercedes-Benz, the flagship of the range, the Â£120,000 plus CL65.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson road tests the Renault VelSatis. Renault's attempt to tackle the executive car sector dominated by Mercedes, Audi and BMW has unusual styling but he likes it.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason pit the Volkswagen Scirocco and Mini Cooper S against each other. Green driving is the subject of Jonny's attention as he gets behind the wheel of Honda's Insight hybrid. Tom drives the world's smallest four seater - the Toyota iQ.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: It's the ultimate showdown, a quarter mile drag between a Formula One car, a superbike and a racing powerboat to find out which is quickest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw is the latest car nut to join the team, and he's been specially tasked with standing up for the beleaguered motorist. Jason Plato and Tiff Needell go head to head on the track to find out which car is fastest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Adrian Simpson get under the skin of bullet-proof cars and go to the secret lab that the world's leading car armourer uses for weapons testing, and race an armoured Range Rover.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and rally driver Mark Higgins set Olympic Skeleton Bob gold medallist Amy Williams and World Pentathlete champion Samantha Murray a track challenge. Expect car damage and the closest ever finish to a Fifth Gear celebrity contest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason is in Iceland being taught how to race a brutal Formula Off-Road buggy up a cliff of volcanic rock by a former champion. Tiff is joined by former Le Mans winner Guy Smith to test a new version of Bentley's best selling car - the Continental GT.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato hold a track battle between two executive cars with over 1000bhp between them. The brand new Audi RS6 and Mercedes E63 AMG are both designed to demolish autobahns

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson heads to Italy to drive a new convertible version of the brilliant Ferrari 458, Tiff Needell conducts a shootout between two ultra-powerful coupes.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Jonny Smith celebrate the legendary Jaguar E-Type's 50th birthday by retracing a famous journey from the car's past, Tiff Needell thrashes the brand new BMW1 SeriesM Coupe in Scotland.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny and new boy Ben Collins - the driver who used to be The Stig perform a two wheel driving stunt, Vicki Butler-Henderson puts the radical new four door Mini Countryman through its paces, Tiff Needell races two fast but green coupes head to head.
